options: Jennifer wants to be a designer.
questions: Which of the following is wrong?
article:
Hi,I am Jennifer.I am 13 years old.I am from Africa.My father is a teacher and my mother works in a hospital.Now they are working in Beijing.They both like their work and work very hard.My father's favorite animal is pandas.but I like dolphins best.
I am studying at a middle school.And I like music and drawing best.I want to be a designer .I like to design my room.I like the color pink,so there are a lot of pink things in my room.
I have three friends in my room.They are Mike.Dora and Peter.They are my toys.I love them.Every night,they sleep on my bed with me.
